transcript: Hi, I just stopped taking metformin because it makes me dizzy

key_facts: Patient stopped taking metformin due to dizziness
result.recommended_next_step: Pharmacist outreach within 24 hours to address side-effect concern and adherence barrier.
result.safe_patient_reply: Thank you for sharing this information. We will follow up with our pharmacist shortly. If symptoms worsen or you feel unsafe, please seek urgent care.

soap_note.subjective: Patient stopped metformin due to dizziness
soap_note.plan: Pharmacist to review transcript and follow up with patient.

pharmacist_task.summary: Patient report of metformin side effect (dizziness)
